bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Transformer Impulse Tests
Redline
IEEE Guide for Transformer Impulse Tests - Redline
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C57.98-2011 (Revision of IEEE Std C57.98-1993) - Redline

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Transformer connections, test methods, circuit configurations, failure analysis of lightning impulse, and switching impulse testing of power transformers are addressed. This guide is also generally applicable to distribution and instrument transformers.

Transformer connections, test methods, circuit configurations, failure analysis of lightning impulse, and switching impulse testing of power transformers are addressed. This guide is also generally applicable to distribution and instrument transformers.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
